sample.datamodel

Class RegisteredUserData

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.datamodel.RegisteredUserData

  • public class RegisteredUserData
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class that stores the data of a of all Registered Users into a Map for later access and in interactive mode it holds information which user is currently logged in. This class is used for handling the log in as well as the registration process of users. It also does some validation and is responsible for saving and loading the data of Registered Users into a binary file.

      • addRating

        public void addRating(java.lang.Integer movieID,
                      java.lang.Double rating)
        Adds a rating to the user that is currently logged in.
        Parameters:
        movieID - The ID of the movie to which a rating should be added.
        rating - The rating the user wants to give the movie.

      • loginUser

        public java.lang.String loginUser(java.lang.String username,
                                  java.lang.String password)
        Processes the information a user has entered into the login form. Checks whether login was successful or not.
        Parameters:
        username - The name the user has entered in the username field of the UI.
        password - The password the user has entered in the password field of the UI.
        Returns:
        Returns a message that indicates whether the login was successful or not.

      • registerNewUser

        public java.lang.String registerNewUser(java.lang.String username,
                                        java.lang.String password)
        Processes the information a user has entered into the registration form. Checks whether registration was successful or not.
        Parameters:
        username - The name the user has entered in the username field of the UI.
        password - The password the user has entered into both passwords fields of the UI.
        Returns:
        Returns a message that indicates whether the registration was successful or not.

      • loadRegisteredUsers

        public void loadRegisteredUsers()
        Method that loads all the Registered User objects from the REGISTERED_USERS_FILE and puts them into a map. The Map maps the user object to the name of the user

      • saveRegisteredUsers

        public void saveRegisteredUsers()
        Method that saves all the Registered User objects to the REGISTERED_USERS_FILE from the registeredUsersMap

      • removeUser

        public void removeUser(java.lang.String username)
        Method is used for removing the dummy user in StaticMode and for testing purposes. Could later also be utilized to implement a functionality for a user to delete his account.
        Parameters:
        username - The name of the user that should be removed.
